characters.name: Sunny
characters.description: The main protagonist. An orphan from the outskirts who awakens with the Shadow Aspect. Known for his cunning mind, dark humor, and ability to survive impossible situations.

characters.name: Nephis
characters.description: A brilliant Legacy from Clan Valor with an inner fire that literally burns within her. One of the most powerful Awakened of her generation.

characters.name: Cassie
characters.description: A blind prophet who can see visions of the future. Despite her gentle nature, her prophecies are incredibly accurate and sometimes terrifying.

characters.name: Kai
characters.description: A handsome Sleeper with a beautiful singing voice. Comes from a wealthy background but harbors secrets about his past.

characters.name: Effie
characters.description: A fierce warrior with incredible physical strength and appetite. Despite her brash exterior, she's fiercely loyal to her cohort.

characters.name: Caster
characters.description: A Legacy from Clan Song who initially seems arrogant but proves to be a capable leader. Has a complex relationship with Sunny.

characters.name: Shadow
characters.description: Sunny's sentient shadow with its own personality. Mischievous and sometimes defiant, but ultimately loyal.

characters.name: Mordret
characters.description: A mysterious and terrifying figure with the ability to possess bodies. One of the most dangerous beings in the Dream Realm.

characters.name: Jet
characters.description: A powerful Master who becomes Sunny's mentor. Cold and efficient, but deeply cares for her students.

characters.name: Teacher Julius
characters.description: An instructor at the Awakened Academy who teaches Sleepers about the Dream Realm and survival.

characters.name: Rain
characters.description: Sunny's younger sister who he's been trying to protect. Her awakening becomes a major plot point.

characters.name: Saint Tyris
characters.description: A powerful Saint who rules over the Bright Castle in the Forgotten Shore.

characters.name: Nightmare
characters.description: The manifestation of the Nightmare Spell that tests Sleepers in their First Nightmare.

characters.name: Serpent
characters.description: A colossal Nightmare Creature that rules the waters of the Forgotten Shore.

characters.name: Morgan
characters.description: A powerful figure from Clan Valor with connections to Nephis's past.

characters.name: Anvil
characters.description: A skilled craftsman who can forge powerful Memories and equipment.

characters.name: Fiend
characters.description: A terrifying Nightmare Creature that hunts in the darkness.

characters.name: Ananke
characters.description: A mysterious entity associated with fate and destiny. One of the most enigmatic beings.

characters.name: Hope
characters.description: A Nightmare Creature that appears almost human. Has a tragic backstory.

characters.name: Siege Master Welthe
characters.description: A military commander in the war against the Nightmare Creatures.

characters.name: Valor
characters.description: One of the Great Clans, known for producing powerful warriors. Nephis's clan.

characters.name: Song
characters.description: One of the Great Clans, known for their prophecies and oracles. Cassie joins this clan.

characters.name: Night
characters.description: One of the Great Clans, associated with darkness and shadow abilities.

characters.name: Sword Domain Saint
characters.description: A legendary Saint known for mastering sword techniques to divine levels.

characters.name: Noctis
characters.description: An ancient Sovereign connected to shadow powers. May have connection to Sunny's Aspect.

characters.name: Weaver
characters.description: A primordial being responsible for creating the fundamental laws of the Dream Realm.

characters.name: Asterion
characters.description: A powerful beast that guards a labyrinth containing great treasures.

characters.name: Solvane
characters.description: A Saint who has achieved a form of immortality through their Aspect.

characters.name: The Spell
characters.description: The mysterious force that brought Nightmare Creatures to Earth and grants humans the chance to become Awakened.

characters.name: Imp
characters.description: A small but cunning Nightmare Creature known for trickery.

characters.name: Serpent King
characters.description: Ruler of the underwater domain in the Forgotten Shore.

characters.name: Stone Saint
characters.description: A Saint whose body turned to stone, leaving behind powerful Memories.

characters.name: Belle
characters.description: A mysterious Awakened with charm-based abilities.

characters.name: Aiko
characters.description: A speed-focused Awakened who joins later expeditions.

characters.name: Dire Beast
characters.description: A powerful wolf-like Nightmare Creature common in the Dream Realm.

characters.name: Sailor Kai
characters.description: An Awakened skilled in naval combat and water navigation.

characters.name: Bloodfiend
characters.description: A vampire-like Nightmare Creature that feeds on blood.

characters.name: War Chief
characters.description: Leader of a tribe of Nightmare Creatures that have developed society.

characters.name: Plague Doctor
characters.description: An Awakened with healing abilities that come at a dark cost.

characters.name: Titan
characters.description: An absolutely massive Nightmare Creature that can level cities.

characters.name: Queen of Shadows
characters.description: A legendary figure associated with the shadow domain.

characters.name: Phoenix
characters.description: A mythical creature that resurrects from its own ashes.

characters.name: Watcher
characters.description: An entity that observes all events in the Dream Realm.

characters.name: Final Guardian
characters.description: The ultimate protector standing between humanity and destruction.

characters.name: Dream Demon
characters.description: The manifestation of pure nightmare energy.

terms.name: Nightmare Spell
terms.description: The mysterious force that brought the Dream Realm to Earth and created the Nightmare Creatures. It grants humans the chance to become Awakened.

terms.name: Awakened
terms.description: Humans who survived their First Nightmare and gained supernatural powers. The second rank after Sleeper.

terms.name: Sleeper
terms.description: A human who has been marked by the Nightmare Spell but hasn't yet undergone their First Nightmare.

terms.name: First Nightmare
terms.description: The trial every Sleeper must survive to become Awakened. Takes place in the Dream Realm.

terms.name: Aspect
terms.description: The unique supernatural ability granted to someone after becoming Awakened. Defines their powers and fighting style.

terms.name: Flaw
terms.description: A weakness or curse that comes with every Aspect. Can be deadly or merely inconvenient.

terms.name: Soul Core
terms.description: The source of an Awakened's power. Contains their essence and abilities.

terms.name: Memory
terms.description: Magical items created from the remnants of defeated Nightmare Creatures or powerful beings.

terms.name: Echo
terms.description: Creatures that can be bound to serve an Awakened, created from defeated Nightmare Creatures.

terms.name: Legacy
terms.description: Descendants of powerful Awakened who inherit enhanced potential and resources.

terms.name: Dream Realm
terms.description: A parallel dimension where Nightmare Creatures originate. Connected to Earth through the Nightmare Spell.

terms.name: Seed of Nightmare
terms.description: Locations where the Dream Realm bleeds into the real world, spawning Nightmare Creatures.

terms.name: Ascension
terms.description: The process of advancing to a higher rank. Requires specific trials and growth.

terms.name: Saint
terms.description: The fifth rank of power. Saints possess god-like abilities and are extremely rare.

terms.name: Great Clans
terms.description: Powerful families that control much of human society. Include Valor, Song, Night, and others.

terms.name: Irregulars
terms.description: Awakened who don't belong to any Great Clan. Often face discrimination.

terms.name: Shadow Dance
terms.description: Sunny's signature ability to manipulate and become one with shadows.

terms.name: Soul Sea
terms.description: The inner realm where an Awakened's soul cores and Memories are stored.

terms.name: Forgotten Shore
terms.description: A dangerous region of the Dream Realm where many Sleepers are sent during their First Nightmare.

terms.name: Bright Castle
terms.description: A stronghold in the Forgotten Shore that offers safety from Nightmare Creatures.

terms.name: Dark City
terms.description: A massive ruined city in the Dream Realm filled with powerful Nightmare Creatures.

terms.name: Nightmare Creature
terms.description: Monsters from the Dream Realm that invade Earth. Range from weak to god-like in power.

terms.name: Dormant
terms.description: The lowest class of Nightmare Creatures. Weak individually but dangerous in numbers.

terms.name: Awakened Beast
terms.description: Nightmare Creatures equivalent to human Awakened in power.

terms.name: Fallen
terms.description: Powerful Nightmare Creatures that have 'fallen' from a higher state.

terms.name: Corrupted
terms.description: Nightmare Creatures that were once something else but have been twisted by darkness.

terms.name: Titan
terms.description: The most powerful class of Nightmare Creatures. Can destroy cities.

terms.name: Sovereign
terms.description: The highest rank achievable. Sovereigns are god-like beings with reality-warping powers.

terms.name: Master
terms.description: The fourth rank of power. Masters are elite Awakened with multiple soul cores.

terms.name: Ascended
terms.description: The third rank of power. Represents significant growth from baseline Awakened.

terms.name: Soul Shards
terms.description: Currency and power source obtained from killing Nightmare Creatures.

terms.name: Attribute
terms.description: Fundamental stats like Strength, Agility, Perception that define an Awakened's capabilities.

terms.name: Ability
terms.description: Special powers granted by an Aspect beyond base attributes.

terms.name: Enchantment
terms.description: Magical effects that can be applied to items or abilities.

terms.name: Divine Aspect
terms.description: Extremely rare and powerful Aspects with unique properties.

terms.name: True Name
terms.description: The fundamental name of a being that holds power over their existence.

terms.name: Shadow Familiar
terms.description: Sunny's ability to create and control shadow creatures.

terms.name: Weave
terms.description: The fundamental structure underlying reality and the Dream Realm.

terms.name: Chains of the Abyss
terms.description: A powerful Memory that Sunny acquires.

terms.name: Stone Saint's Legacy
terms.description: The tomb and treasures left behind by the Stone Saint.

terms.name: Antarctic Expedition
terms.description: A major military expedition to fight Nightmare Creatures in Antarctica.

terms.name: Second Nightmare
terms.description: The trial to advance from Awakened to Ascended. Even more dangerous than the First.

terms.name: Third Nightmare
terms.description: The trial to advance from Ascended to Master. Survival rate is extremely low.

terms.name: Fourth Nightmare
terms.description: The trial to advance from Master to Saint. Few ever attempt it.

terms.name: Siege of the Forgotten Shore
terms.description: A major battle where the cohort had to defend against waves of Nightmare Creatures.

terms.name: Fall of the Bright Castle
terms.description: The destruction of the main safe haven in the Forgotten Shore.

terms.name: Government Awakened Forces
terms.description: Military units composed of Awakened that defend human territories.

terms.name: Spell Academy
terms.description: Schools that train Sleepers before their First Nightmare.

terms.name: Dream Shard
terms.description: Fragments of the Dream Realm that contain concentrated power.

terms.name: Shadow Realm
terms.description: A domain within the Dream Realm associated with shadow powers.

terms.name: Citadel
terms.description: Major human fortification designed to withstand Nightmare Creature attacks.

terms.name: Dreamer
terms.description: Rare individuals who can consciously enter and navigate the Dream Realm.

terms.name: Nightmare Gate
terms.description: Portals between the real world and Dream Realm.

terms.name: Ancient War
terms.description: A legendary conflict that shaped the current state of the Dream Realm.

terms.name: Six Chains
terms.description: Sunny's signature ability representing different aspects of his shadow power.

terms.name: Domain
terms.description: An area of absolute control that Saints can manifest.

terms.name: Soul Flame
terms.description: The inner fire that powers an Awakened's abilities.

terms.name: Core Compression
terms.description: Technique to increase power by compressing soul cores.

terms.name: Reality Anchor
terms.description: Ability to resist reality-warping effects.

terms.name: Soul Bond
terms.description: Deep connection between two Awakened that shares power and fate.

terms.name: Oblivion
terms.description: The void beyond the Dream Realm where even gods fear to tread.

terms.name: Genesis
terms.description: The original creation event that spawned the Nightmare Spell.

terms.name: Twilight Sea
terms.description: A vast ocean in the Dream Realm between major landmasses.

terms.name: World Tree
terms.description: A legendary structure connecting different layers of the Dream Realm.

terms.name: Final Nightmare
terms.description: The prophesied event that will determine humanity's ultimate fate.

terms.name: Apotheosis
terms.description: The theoretical transcendence beyond Sovereign rank.

terms.name: God-King
terms.description: Beings who have achieved complete mastery over the Dream Realm.

locations.name: Forgotten Shore
locations.description: A dangerous coastal region in the Dream Realm where many Sleepers are sent for their First Nightmare. Features ruins, monsters, and the Bright Castle.

locations.name: Bright Castle
locations.description: A fortified castle in the Forgotten Shore that serves as a refuge for survivors.

locations.name: Dark City
locations.description: A massive ruined metropolis in the Dream Realm, filled with powerful Nightmare Creatures and ancient secrets.

locations.name: Spell Academy
locations.description: Schools in the real world that train Sleepers before they undergo their First Nightmare.

locations.name: Outskirts
locations.description: The poor districts on the edge of cities where Sunny grew up. Lawless and dangerous.

locations.name: Antarctic Citadel
locations.description: A major human fortification in Antarctica, site of crucial battles against Nightmare Creatures.

locations.name: Valor Estate
locations.description: The ancestral home of Clan Valor, one of the most powerful Great Clans.

locations.name: Song Tower
locations.description: Headquarters of Clan Song, known for their oracles and prophecies.

locations.name: Night Palace
locations.description: The shadowy domain of Clan Night.

locations.name: Stone Saint's Tomb
locations.description: The burial place of the Stone Saint, containing powerful Memories.

locations.name: Labyrinth
locations.description: A massive maze-like structure guarded by Asterion the Bull.

locations.name: Shadow Realm
locations.description: A domain of pure darkness within the Dream Realm.

locations.name: Serpent's Domain
locations.description: The underwater territory ruled by the Serpent King.

locations.name: Mountain of Trials
locations.description: A legendary peak where powerful Awakened go to advance.

locations.name: Twilight Sea
locations.description: A vast ocean separating major Dream Realm continents.

locations.name: World Tree
locations.description: A colossal tree connecting different planes of the Dream Realm.

locations.name: Abyss
locations.description: The deepest, most dangerous region of the Dream Realm.

locations.name: Eastern Wasteland
locations.description: A desolate region ravaged by ancient battles.

locations.name: Celestial Tower
locations.description: A tower reaching into the heavens of the Dream Realm.

locations.name: Nightmare Core
locations.description: The theoretical center of the Dream Realm.

events.name: First Nightmare
events.description: Sunny's traumatic trial in the Forgotten Shore that awakened his powers.

events.name: Battle of the Forgotten Shore
events.description: Major conflict where Sunny's cohort defended against waves of Nightmare Creatures.

events.name: Fall of the Bright Castle
events.description: The destruction of the main safe haven, forcing survivors to flee.

events.name: Escape from the Forgotten Shore
events.description: The cohort's desperate journey to return to the real world.

events.name: Antarctic Campaign
events.description: A major military operation against Nightmare Creatures in Antarctica.

events.name: Second Nightmare
events.description: Sunny's trial to advance from Awakened to Ascended.

events.name: Third Nightmare
events.description: Sunny's trial to reach Master rank.

events.name: Siege of the Citadel
events.description: A massive battle defending human territory.

events.name: Discovery of the Weave
events.description: Understanding the fundamental nature of reality.

events.name: Shadow Sovereign's Trial
events.description: Sunny's confrontation with his Aspect's origin.

events.name: Genesis Revelation
events.description: The truth about the Nightmare Spell's creation is revealed.

events.name: Final Battle
events.description: The climactic confrontation that determines humanity's fate.
